title: The WTB Vulpine is back as a 700c x 36mm fast gravel race tire!
content:
Not long after we posted our findings from Sea Otter, a box of tires showed up at the office. It would seem that WTBâ€™s newest gravel tire was a lot closer to launching than we expected. That prototype tire we spotted in Monterey was indeed the new Vulpine tire as speculated by readers in the

The post The WTB Vulpine is back as a 700c x 36mm fast gravel race tire! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
